mapper.select: SELECT bno, title, writer, regDate, hit FROM board ORDER BY bno DESC

SELECT bno, title, contents, writer, regdate, hit FROM( SELECT rownum as rn, bno, title, contents, writer, regdate, hit FROM board WHERE rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
SELECT bno, title, contents, writer, regDate, hit FROM board WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( bno, writer, title, contents ) VALUES ( bno_seq.nextval, #{writer}, #{title}, #{contents} )
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, writer = #{writer}, contents = #{contents} WHERE bno = #{bno}
